title: Mayflower Design System
subtitle: Leading the transistion from Mass.gov Front-end framework to the Commonwealth Design System

paragraphs: The goals of Mayflower are: 1) To create a consistent, inclusive user experience and look and feel across the Commonwealthâ€™s discrete and diverse digital ecosystem for the constituents. 2) To allow Digital Services team and its customers efficiently design and build accessible, mobile-friendly and consistent web products using Mayflower as a unified design system.

I'm the Product Owner of Mayflower that comes up with the long-term vision and quarterly goals for building it into a design system, leading the transition from a front-end framework for Mass.gov redesign to a Commonwealth Design System that is used to create a single face of government. I'm also working hands-on as a designer auditing and creating desgin principles and as a developer refactoring and writing code for components.
